name: Daikin Chemical Europe GmbH
membership: Daikin Chemical Europe GmbH is member of the following EU associations, or participates as subsidiary/affiliated company of other Daikin entities joining the following associations: CEFIC/EFCTC, EPEE, PlasticsEurope, FluoroCouncil Europe, EDANA, and VCI (TEGEWA) (Germany)
goal: Supply of high-performance chemicals which are used in various industries with attention to the environmental footprint
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Transport
euInitiatives:
Chemical and environmental related policies and legislations

Climate and energy related policies and legislations
